description:
The lightweight Nano 16 is ready to take on any adventure, from a hike on the local trails to a exploring the street markets of Europe. A low-profile packable design makes it easy to stuff inside your checked luggage, then deploy at your destination.

  • Made of lightweight yet abrasion-resistant 210-denier nylon ripstop with an extra-durable 420-denier high-density nylon base panel
  • Perforated foam harness and hipbelt comfortably carry the load without excess weight and bulk
  • Webbing waistbelt stabilizes the load or can be removed if you don't need it
  • Zippered front pocket has an internal organizer and a key clip
  • Side mesh pockets carry water bottles
  • Front loop lets you clip on a blinky light and reflective side loops secure water bottles or other gear
  • Hydration system compatible with reservoir hanger and hydration port. (Reservoir sold separately)
  • Plus size packs are designed with extended shoulder straps and hip belts, along with additional fit revisions to accommodate larger body shapes and sizes
  • Fits hips up to 152cm
name: Gregory Nano 16 Plus Size Backpack - Unisex
